body.name: Shredded Memory Foam Pillows for Sleeping,Bed Pillows Queen Size Set of 2 Pack Adjustable,Good for Side and Back Sleeper with Washable Removable Cover
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 37 mins
features: ❤Breathable and cooling pillows:Our memory foam pillows use a cooling shredded foam technology to keep you cool all night. The breathable cover keeps your pillow dry and provides maximum comfort.

❤Luxurious pillow cases: Our rayon made from bamboo pillow cases are a great alternative to down or latex pillows. The pillow covers are also washable. The skin-friendly soft cover is made of 60% polyester and 40% rayon made from bamboo.This eco-friendly material can increase breathability and ventilation, and naturally wicks moisture away from the skin, resists odor, and provides a cooler sleeping experience than others

❤Adjustable pillow to fit you:sleeping pillows features a zippered inner and outer cover, you can ADD or REMOVE foam filling to find the perfect comfort level and enjoy a personalized sleep experience. Best Pillows for side, back, stomach and pregnant sleepers.

❤Best filling material:The pillows won't flatten as you shift throughout the night.Unlike other pillows – we freshly manufacture our foam instead of using repurposed materials.Our bed pillows use premium shredded foam allows the pillow to let air through every area, and is infused temperature regulating cooling gel particles into the foam to alleviate excessive heat build-up, so no heat is captured during the night.

❤NEVER FLAT & 5 YEARS WARRANTY:We are very confident about the quality of our soft pillow. We pride 90 Nights Risk Free Trail and 5 year warranty. If for any reason you are not satisfied, please contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Good quality of memory foam pillows to give you a comfortable and peaceful night .These luxuries beddings stay fresh, cool during hot nights and warm in cold nights - leaving you and your family rested and ready for a new day.

Best Memory Foam Pillows You can adjust to your unique size and sleep position for restorative sleep and energized mornings. Ideal for hot sleepers, the cross-cut memory foam fill is infused with gel to create a cooler sleep experience — that means no more gross, sweaty nights spent tossing and turning.

Double Zippers And Cases Design With 2 zippers decorative case design,you can simply open the zipper ,add or remove the memory foam to find the height that suits you best. The outer case can be cleaned, designed to be simple and easy to clean, giving you a comfortable and healthy sleep. Outer cover made with bamboo derived rayon regulates temperature for comfort and breathable , it's also removable & machine washable.Create a comfortable, constant temperature sleeping environment Gel infused memory foam pillows. A wonderful balance between firm and soft. Supportive as well as comfortable sleeping bed pillow. Best pillows for you to relieve your pain of head, neck ,shoulder and body. NEVER BE FLAT!

How to Prep: The pillows arrive compress packed. For optimal use, prep as below: Open the plastic wrap and remove the pillowsPlease unwrap and fluff it up manually to its full size by kneading apping and shaking. Please give 48-72 hours to the pillow to fully expand.By placing the pillows in the sun for a few hours on a bright day will evaporate the moisture that builds up overnight, and the pillows will fluff up over the day and to make sure your pillows become fluffier and softer.There will be a slight material flavor after opening, please don’t worry that they are harmless. Air for a few hours to eliminate trapped odors. How to Clean The pillows are fade and stain-resistant. For best results, clean as below: Wash on a delicate cycle using cold waterDry by laying flat on a well-ventilated area

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fills out nicely - super fluffy yet firm pillows
reviews.reviewText: At first I was a bit worried because the package is so small. Once the pillows had some time to fluff up, they were great! I am happy with the length and the size of the pillows. They are a great addition to the bed!These are a great buy and look and feel great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We were looking for an alternative to the my pillow guy, and this is a great substitute. I had ordered the two pack on sale when my 85 year old Dad came to visit and needed a pillow. I let him borrow these and he liked them so much, he decided to keep them! So I ordered another pair for myself and my husband. A comfy, heavy, full pillow at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality, customizable, soft!
reviews.reviewText: I’m in love! I have purchased an embarrassing number of pillows in the last 2 years in an effort to find the right one for me. I discovered that not all pillows work with all mattresses after buying a new mattress. With this pillow, it doesn’t matter what mattress you have, because it is easy to adjust it to your preference. Save the stuffing you remove, and you can add it back if ever needed. The outer layer is luxuriously soft and well made. For my needs, it’s a little thick, which isn’t a deal breaker. But if I wasn’t a side-sleeping cpap user, it would be perfect. They arrive vac sealed but puff up quickly. They are pretty overstuffed, which is great if you want to get a third pillow with what you pull out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just the right height, the shape doesn't collapse after awhile like other pillows. Very lasting. I've bought these many times for beds around my house and they are amazing. They are long lasting (I still use the others I bought a couple years back) and soft and they give the support it needs. I love how you can remove the foam to adjust how much you need. I never remove them but it's always good to have that option available. I'm a side sleeper so I'm not sure about back sleepers but from my experience... This is one of the best pillows to get. It's worth the price for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent pillow with plenty of elevation for a side sleeper - and at a cheap price
reviews.reviewText: So far, it's better than the COOP pillow that was my previous favorite pillow. I looked at this one because COOP jacked up their price beyond all sense. It's very soft but elevates my head well - and I have broad shoulders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The memory foam is great in the sense of not going flat, but kinda hard to get to compress to be comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted down pillows but stumbled on to these instead. I love these pillows so much! They are so plush, yet offer support! I’m ordering more for other beds in our house. I highly recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Three Bears!
reviews.reviewText: First image (green pillow) is of a "high quality" pillow I spent big $$$ on just for it to go flat within a couple of months compared to the new pillow that is extremely fluffy frim just bought on Amazon.I have tried memory foam pillows that were one solid piece and they were too firm against my face (side sleeper). They could not be manipulated in a position to be made comfortable.This pillow is "heavy", packed full of memory foam shreds and firm!HOWEVER,This pillow also gives into the weight of the face and neck without losing its firmness!The zippers are high quality!The outer cover is super soft and well sewn.The inner cover is also well sewn and fairly soft.The memory foam shreds are cube-ish and very small making the pillow super soft.I have been through SO MANY EXPENSIVE pillows in the past two years trying to find a GOOD pillow!*** THIS is the ONE! ***Did I mention DELIVERED SAME DAY!? THANK YOU AMAZON! Ordered two more!
